comment.caption: Visitors walk past the``Dotty Wotty House'' 26 Sep
comment.note: DETROIT, UNITED STATES: Visitors walk past the``Dotty Wotty House'' 26 September, part of the Heidelberg Project in Detroit, which officials are trying to tear down. Artist Tyree Guyton creates folk art by covering part of a neighborhood with polka dots in what he calls "art for the people and medicine for the soul." AFP PHOTO/Jeff KOWALSKY (Photo credit should read JEFF KOWALSKY/AFP/Getty Images)
